contextId.information: The servant is comparing how much more willing Naaman should be to obey a simple command since he is willing to obey a difficult one. AT: "How much more willing you should be to obey" or "Should you not be even more willing to obey" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The missing words may be added. AT: "If you will not take the gifts I have brought for you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The missing words may be added. AT: "dove's dung was sold for" or "dove's dung cost" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
